modName: Better DragonBorn Armor and Weapon stats
summary:
Just a quick change to the armor stats of the DLC 
 CONTAINS SPOILERS
descriptionHtml:
Contains Spoilers!!! 



Changes the bonemold armors, chifitin armors, ancient nord armors, and stalrim armors.
to daedric quality and above. 

plz note that i have not changed the Value (Gold) of the armor yet.
suggestions for values would be appreciated 

did this because i wanted new armor, that was worth my while at lvl 62.
if you use it, endorse it!

REQUIRES DRAGONBORN

this is the stats of unmodded daedric armor:
curaiss = 49
boots = 18
glove = 18
helm = 23
sheild = 36

these are the modified stats of dragonborn armors  () the brackets are the original values
Chiftin heavy:
curaiss = 49   (40)
boots = 18   (14)
glove = 18   (14)
helm = 23   (19)
sheild = 35    (24.5)

Chifitn Light:
curaiss = 33.5    (30)
boots = 11.5    (8.5)
glove = 11.5    (8.5)
helm = 16.5    (13.5)
sheild = 35    (24.5)

Bonemold:
curaiss = 50,49,48 (theres 3)  (32)
boots = 19   (12)
glove = 19   (12)
helm = 24   (17)
sheild = 35.5    (21)

Improved Bonemold:
curaiss = 55   (35)
boots = 22   (13)
glove = 23   (13)
helm = 28   (18)
sheild = 37   (26)

Nord Heavy:
curaiss = 54    (43)
boots = 19    (15)
glove = 19    (15)
helm = 24    (20)
sheild = 36.6     (26.6)

stahlrim heavy:
curaiss = 60    (46)
boots = 23    (17)
glove = 23    (17)
helm = 29    (22)
sheild = 39    (29.5)

Stahlrim light:
curaiss = 42    (39)
boots = 14.5    (11.5)
glove = 14.5    (11.5)
helm = 19.5    (16.5)
sheild = 39    (29.5)


UPDATE
now includes mora tong armor:
curaiss = 34    (26)
boots = 12    (8)
glove = 12    (7)
helm = 17    (12)



WEAPONS - () the brackets are the original values
vanilla daedric
battleaxe = 25
bow = 19
dagger = 11
greatsword = 24
mace = 16
sword = 14
waraxe = 15
hammer = 27

stalhrim
battleaxe = (24) 26
bow = (17) 20
dagger = (10) 12
greatsword = (23) 25
mace = (16) 17
waraxe = (15) 16
sword = (13) 15
hammer = (26) 28

nordic carved
battleaxe = (21) 25
bow = (13) 19
dagger = (8) 11
greatsword = (20) 24
mace = (16) 16
waraxe = (12) 15
sword = (11) 14
hammer = (23) 27


check out my other mods
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3708/
